title: Web-Based Problem-Based Learning (PBL) and Self-Regulated Learning (SRL) Integrated Education for Enhancing Vocational School Students' Competency in Utilizing Package Software

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and comprehension of software interfaces
context.additional_context: Providing personalized learning experiences using individual mobile devices, emphasizing job relevance through real-life problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners can explain procedures for solving real workplace problems using packaged software according to given scenarios.
Learners can establish self-regulated learning strategies through web-based platforms and achieve over 90% of weekly learning goals.
Learners can submit 100% of PBL deliverables (e.g., data analysis reports) incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
